website_summaries.verdict: An affordable and convenient option that delivers brighter skin without over-stripping or burning. Though not the strongest on the market, it is the best deal.
pros: An innovative product with glycolic and lactic acids infused with botanicals in convenient gauze pads
Effective yet gentle peel that can be used up to 3 times a week
Earns praise for its pleasing scent
cons: Too mild for some uses – it's good at exfoliating and brightening skin, but not intended to make major changes such as minimizing lines and other imperfections

customer_reviews.title: Wine is Good All Over
customer_reviews.text: Love these. They’re great as part of my daily Korean regimen, but they’re also amazing if I’m in a hurry and can’t get through all the steps. Would highly recommend as I’ve seen brighter skin and help with the unevenness I’ve experienced
customer_reviews.author: Ashley T.

customer_reviews.title: SOOOO much dirt came out! I felt so clean ...
customer_reviews.text: SOOOO much dirt came out! I felt so clean and refreshed! Tried it on my friend after she took a shower, she cried so much after looking at the amount of dirt that came out. We've been living a lie all our lives
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I only used it once but I like it so far
customer_reviews.text: I only used it once but I like it so far. Tip of those who are cheap like me: after I am done using it on the face, it put a little bit water to moisten it up again and do the same thing down on my feel. It helps a lot to get rid of the dead skin under your feet; and you can use 1 pad for 2 areas. Lol
customer_reviews.author: cybergirlllvn

customer_reviews.title: Glorious face product !!!
customer_reviews.text: I was told about this stuff from a friend and it does not disappoint. When you get the product you’ll notice it’s all in a different language: here are the steps 1. Wash face 2. Use product 3. Toner 4. Moisturize The product comes with little pads. one side has little cotton ridges that is the smooth side- the other is exfoliating. Do the smooth side first then flip it over and exfoliate. It leaves a little bit of sticky residue on your face which I wash off with water about 5-10 minutes later then do toner and moisturizer or serum. And the smell - it is glorious. It’s called a peel but doesn’t really make your skin peel.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi Lundeberg

customer_reviews.title: OBSESSED
customer_reviews.text: I have congested skin and these always leave my completion looking and feeling beautiful. Makeup lays especially well after using these. Definitely not for every day use - 3x/week should do it for ya. Pro tip: cut the pads in half. A full pad is more than you’ll need to cover your face and neck
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: I had breakouts
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product hoping it would help my acne-prone skin. Turnout, I had more, severe acne after i started using this product and i mediately stopped using it. I do not recommend this product at all. I cannot even read (since its all in korean) what kind of chemicals are in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lila

customer_reviews.title: BEST PRODUCT EVER!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This works so good!!! My skin feels amazing after using this ! Smell is like grape jelly ( which I like) the pads are well made and the scrubbing side is the perfect balance of enough to help take off the dead skin without harming the live cells. I use the extra on my elbows and knees. Too good to waste
customer_reviews.author: Sally ann Sulick

customer_reviews.title: All time favorite exfoliator
customer_reviews.text: Cannot say enough good things about this product. As I'm always looking to try new products, I stumbled across this one in an article online and instantly fell in love with it on the first try. The scent is delicious, the formula is gentle but effective, and I love the entire concept of this. Bought several while in Korea (prices are a bit lower) and have gotten quite a few friends hooked on these as well! Update: they also make great gifts, as they are not too pricey but last for a long time (:
customer_reviews.author: KKN

customer_reviews.title: Great exfoliator
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. I use these in the shower. They smell like grape jelly. There is a lot of product on each pad (which is a good thing). After using it on my face, I will use it on my neck as well. Since there is so much product, I will then use it on my problem area for that day (heels of feet, elbows, knees, etc). The rough side gives me the satisfaction of a physical exfoliation, while the smooth side helps buff out my skin. I would buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: DoeEyedFawn

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite exfoliators! LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a skin care freak, so at this point I've tried lots of products, including exfoliators. I have to say this is one of my favorites. My skin felt insanely soft and clean after using this, and it made a visible difference in my skin after just one use. I have sensitive skin too, and it hasn't caused any issues at all. I always make sure to exfoliate once or twice per week then keep my skin hydrated with serums and moisturizers especially after using this. Will definitely continue to use this.
customer_reviews.author: Liz L. Bucher

customer_reviews.title: Great for keratosis pilaris and acne prone skin, smells like candy
customer_reviews.text: I use this product every 2 days not only on my face, but on my upper arms and my butt. I have keratosis pilaris on my arms and butt and regular use of this product has cleared it right up. On my butt it also helps keep things smooth and helps keep acne/ scarring at bay. I use one pad for face and arms and a separate pad for my booty, of course making sure I don't get it in the crack. I like to let this product sit on my skin for about 30 mins to an hour before I hop in the shower.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin B

customer_reviews.title: Occasional Exfoliation
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used this on a regular basis, so I can't comment on that. I do use it on occasion when my skin feels dirty or dull. I scrub pretty good with the rough side and smooth it over with the softer side starting on my face and using the rest on my neck. It isn't drying at all and doesn't break me out, which would be a deal breaker. My skin feels very soft afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Brown

customer_reviews.title: Holy Shmokes!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd time ordering this product. I absolutely LOVE it. Whenever my face feels bleh or is about to break out , I use this. I use it at least once a week to refresh my face. It is definitely a holy grail for me. I have super large pores, plus super oily skin, and this product always seems to know how to make my skin feel better. It doesn’t dry out my face, and I feel squeaky clean. I’d recommend it to anyone and everyone.
customer_reviews.author: A. Caballero

customer_reviews.title: Gentle and it works
customer_reviews.text: It has a very nice scent, refreshes my skin, and feels like my skin is softer. This is not a hard peeling. This is a lot softer than other peelings. If you are looking for deep penetration, this is not for you. However, perfect one to remove dirt and dead skin. After using it my skin feels very soft and energized. I have oily skin and everything causes breakouts. This helps me to stay refreshed.
customer_reviews.author: EZ

customer_reviews.title: Glowing skin
customer_reviews.text: I have combination skin. I prefer physical exfoliation to chemical and these are the best of both worlds. The rough side of the pad gets all the rough, dry skin. Then sweep the soft side over the face to calm and soothe the freshly exfoliated face. Rinse with cool water and feel brand new. The reservatrol is great for anti-aging and smells of nice grapes. I really see a nice, glowy difference in my skin when I use these. I've also used the green ones which are great too. I'm sure the yellow is nice as well! Love neogen as a brand!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna L

customer_reviews.title: Best kept secret
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying these for about 2 years now. first use the scrubby side for about 2 minutes. Then use the soft side for about a minute. I like to let it sit on my skin for about 5 minutes before rinsing off. It's like a little facial in a bottle. Your skin feels so clean and smooth afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Adrien

customer_reviews.title: Makes me glow; good for sensitive skin; smells amazing
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what these do, but I'm hooked. They smell AMAZING, they are easy and fun to use, and I have to say that my skin is glowing since using them. I just use one to exfoliate a couple times a week in the shower after washing my face. It takes like a second. And it makes the whole shower smell like red wine; what's not to love? Oh, and I have very very sensitive skin that breaks out into a rash at almost everything. But these are gentle and good for my sensitive face skin.
customer_reviews.author: Psyche Ready

customer_reviews.title: Best exfoliant on the market.
customer_reviews.text: This is the only exfoliant I use anymore. I have dry, sensitive skin and it doesn't bother me. It does a wonderful job of exfoliating and clearing up the skin without being too harsh. I buy the wine ones, and I really like the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Misled by name of product
customer_reviews.text: It's my own fault for not doing a deeper dive before buying this product, but when it said "peeling" in the name and "peel" in the description, I thought it was a peeling mask. I was disappointed to find out it was not. It's more of an extremely gentle scrub, with a delightful purple smell. It seems like a good product (I don't have problem skin at the moment), but I also am not happy with the delivery method - the pre-soaked pads have too much product for one application, causing some waste. I would prefer the pads and liquid to be separate so I could control the amount.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie B

customer_reviews.title: Smells great
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a light peeling or exfoliating product thelat wasn't damaging to my skin. This bio peel hasn't caused issied with my sensitive skin, however, that may be because this is a very very light peel. If you are willing to use the product regularly and wait patiently then you may get the results you're hoping for. Otherwise, you will get very subtle results. I can't see much difference on my face, if any. But I can feel my face is softer and maybe a little brighter. The peel smells fantastic so thats one positive note.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these pads, the best value. First of all, they are gigantic, a little mitt you put your fingers in and use the tough side for scrubbing your face gently, the padded side to apply product. Smells like GRAPES which is oddly delicious to me, even more if you keep product in fridge. The BEST VALUE, heard about it as Amazon Top Choice on Elite Daily. LOVE, LOVE, LOVE. You feel clean and refreshed, ready to apply serum after.
customer_reviews.author: Lilac Bouquet

customer_reviews.title: Youthful skin
customer_reviews.text: Love this, made my face so fresh and glowy. Too pricey to use it every other day so I use it once a week. Made me look years younger:)
customer_reviews.author: Thuy Hoang

customer_reviews.title: This smells so good
customer_reviews.text: I was so afraid that this was gonna make my skin peel or react poorly to it. It didn’t!! I really love anything from this company. I swear by them. I’ve never been disappointed. I know they’re pricey but they’re honestly worth it. I’ll definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Carmela C

customer_reviews.title: Love these wine peeling pads!
customer_reviews.text: First, these peeling pads really smell amazing, like grape candy! Second, I love that each pad is really soaked in the product! You can use both sides without them getting dry. There is a "scrubbing" side and a "smooth" side. I have dry, sensitive skin, and these do not dry my skin out or make it irritated. Love the DERMALOGY brand. They have some really great products. I will definitely purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Purl

customer_reviews.title: Awesome- guaranteed rebuy
customer_reviews.text: So, so awesome at exfoliating. One of those products where it's so gratifying to look at all the grime the mitt has pulled off! This will give you a nice reset even on stubborn dry or scaly skin. I use roughly twice a week, I give a good scrub with the "smooth" side which exfoliates and then blot the puffy side over again to let them essence soak into my skin. The pads are big enough to easily do my face, neck, and chest which is awesome as my sun damaged skin there is aging and needs it. 100% will continue to re-buy this, very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: JJD

customer_reviews.title: Works VERY well!
customer_reviews.text: I really love these!~ They smell great and really cleaned my face. They also come in great packaging, very sturdy and had a seal before opening to keep moisture in. My boyfriend also tried these and really enjoyed the process (He isnt into skin care so the fact that he was into these means a lot)! Update!: I brought these over to my friends house and had her try one, the next day she texted me asking for the link to buy them because her skin has never looked so good and felt so soft~ So far 3/3 people were amazed by this product!
customer_reviews.author: Koko

customer_reviews.title: I would purchase again..
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive oily/dry combo skin, ive been looking for an exfoliating product & this was highly suggested. This one smells like artificial grapes (which is probably the last thing I’d like to smell) but overall the smell doesn’t bother me too much, I could do without though. There’s a rough side and smooth side, it’s not too harsh for the skin. I didn’t have any bad side effects/ irritation. I liked the product and love Neogen. Shipping came on time and product was fully sealed.
customer_reviews.author: Noel

customer_reviews.title: Great for Exfoliating, but price almost doubled in 6 months.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product for 16.28 which is what I paid for it the first time I purchased it. Six months later when I went to order my second jar, the price had gone up to 27.00. I don't think it's worth that, and it just rubs me the wrong way to find something that is finally affordable, only to have it suddenly be at a completely different price point.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya F. Harris

customer_reviews.title: but I like it. I use it whenever my face feels ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't know if this did wonders for me, but I like it. I use it whenever my face feels really gross and flaky, usually once a week. The first time I used it I scrubbed wayyy too hard and my face was burning and red but it felt squeaky clean afterwards. Doesn't dry out my skin, which is oily combo and acne prone. Scent is a strong grape candy smell which smells good after the first couple pads but it's tiring after a while. Would purchase again but probably with a different scent just for something new.
customer_reviews.author: M. Yang

customer_reviews.title: Heart Eyes
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! I can't give them complete credit because I've been taking better care of my skin for months and only started using these a few weeks ago, but even after using a pad just once, I could tell there was a difference. My skin tone is brighter and clear and these have definitely contributed to that. My only complaint is I have long nails so it makes it hard to balance the pad on my fingers to swipe it over my face lol.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Lynnette

customer_reviews.title: Radiant results. Easy to use. Skin gets better and better.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the wine twice a week and have seen amazing results in the last two months. The fine lines under my eyes are not as noticeable and my skin tone has never been clearer. Even my sun spots are not as darker as it used to be. I follow up with the Missha toner and anti aging moisturizer afterwards in addition to sunscreen (day time). This product is not harsh on my skin and it gives me a nice glow every time I used it. I’m hooked as other exfoliating products have been a bit abrasive and left my skin feeling like it got dragged through the sand.
customer_reviews.author: Koko

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I must have a pretty good skin care routine because I have not noticed anything different while using this product. The smell is awful, like coolaid. It does exfoliate, but be careful not to overdo it because it can hurt. I have tried other exfoliants that work way better than this one, plus it's way too expensive for what it is
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Great brand!
customer_reviews.text: I found this product first on SokoGlam.com. I used the Green Tea tree. I loved it and it lasted for awhile and stayed fresh. When I saw the Wine scrub pads were cheaper with free shipping on Amazon I was sold! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Cher1980

customer_reviews.title: Clearer skin
customer_reviews.text: This product smells amazing. After using the product a few times I started to see a difference in my skin. From clearness to tightness. My skin looks younger and I feel so much better looking in the mirror
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Very gentle, smells great
customer_reviews.text: These are very gentle and smell delicious, like grape candy! They work as a very, very gentle peel that leaves your skin softer in the morning. I use it 2-3 times a week and have noticed smoother skin in general.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer S.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful exfoliate!
customer_reviews.text: I discovered this little gem on reddit! Decided to give this a shot as my skin's texture is deplorable. After about a month of using this product twice weekly, there's been a HUGE improvement to my skin's texture and fine lines that I have around my mouth. I personally enjoy the smell, very similar to grape juice. My skin is also very sensitive and acne prone and this didn't cause irritation.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Great product, really works!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful scent, great ingredients that genuinely help the dead skin come off. I use the soft side to apply the product, let it sit a minute, then use the rough side to rub off the skin that is ready to go. It works soooo well, and I want you to know that I have really sensitive skin but this product doesn't irritate me at all.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: I really enjoy
customer_reviews.text: This seems to really work. The pads come drenched in the product so they won't dry out. The jar is huge. It actually smells sweet not actually like the scent of wine. The exfoliator pad is gentle but works. The reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 is because I would like to use it longer. I will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Pope

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan of the wine.
customer_reviews.text: I dont know why but I really liked the LEMON version of this product and my skin despised the WINE flavor. I also thought the grape candy smell was kind of gross. Im using them up on my back bc it can tolerate the harsh irritants more than my face. I would be curious to find out why the lemon worked so much better for me. Regardless, make sure you rinse these off and dont leave this acid in your skin too long beebees.
customer_reviews.author: Haza11

customer_reviews.title: I use this twice a week in my nightime skincare ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this twice a week in my nightime skincare routine. It's really refreshing on the skin and it's satisfying when you see leftover residue of dirt or makeup on the pads that your cleansing oil and foaming cleanser missed.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this along with 7 other Korean skin care stuff so I couldn’t tell you which one make my skin looked better. It has a nice grape scent
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because I watch too many Korean skin care YouTube videos. I purchased this along with 7 other Korean skin care stuff so I couldn’t tell you which one make my skin looked better. It has a nice grape scent. You can see the crap that came off of your face on the pad when you are done. And it’s relaxing to just massage that pad on your face. I will buy this product again because it cost $17 and it will last you a few months.
customer_reviews.author: MeanieFilipinie

customer_reviews.title: Nothing gets my face this smooth!
customer_reviews.text: Over the years I've tried many exfoliators - scrubs, konjac sponges, special wash cloths - and nothing comes close to how smooth and soft my face feels after using these pads. They have a pretty rough scrubby side and then a softer "quilted" side. My face isn't overly sensitive so I enjoy really scrubbing the heck out of it with the scrubby side, then buffing it out with the quilted side. I would recommend starting with the softer side if you have sensitive skin. I use these twice a week and love how bright and glowy my skin looks afterwards. My husband also loves these and he has oily, acne prone skin.
customer_reviews.author: BonnieB

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful scent, and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I am sensitive to strong artificial scents, but this has a pleasant odor and does not trigger my migraines. I love the convenience of the pads, as opposed to scubs that require application and then an extra rinsing step. I find this speeds up my routine substantially. I use them twice a week as part of my skin routine. I do have several scrubs that, quite honestly, do a better job. But I love this product for the conveniece and lack of mess. I will purchase4 again.
customer_reviews.author: P. Zack

customer_reviews.title: OMG, i love how my skin feels!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! So much dirt came off and my skin felt incredible after. I put on rosehip oil after added even more softness. The wine smells like grape bubblegum which I like but now I want grape bubble gum. Can you please include grape bubblegum with this product to satisfy the craving you get. LOL. I left one star off for price. You only get 30 pads which is about 2 weeks worth if you do it twice a week. Can get expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Only have used this once but I loved it! Great exfoliation! My skin was so smooth and glowing after! Took one star off cause I thought there'd be more liquid in it then what was there based off other people's photos. Container was sealed great and packages was shipped great! Shipping was a little slower than anticipated but only by a couple days. Also it's a STRONG candied grape smell. Like grape popsicles. I hate grape stuff but I know this is the best anti aging one 😂
customer_reviews.author: samantha sandy

customer_reviews.title: English instructions????
customer_reviews.text: There are no English instructions at all! I ordered this product in the USA. I assumed there would be English instructions. I haven't used it, because I do not understand the instructions. Unreal!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Affordable alternate
customer_reviews.text: So I use this maybe once a week when I feel like my face needs some exfoliation. I have very sensitive skin and this did not irritate my face at all! I love the smell. I took off my one star because I'm not sure how good the ingredients are in this product but I would recommend this if you need a cheaper alternate from the high end products! Love the smell too!
customer_reviews.author: J. Vo

customer_reviews.title: Work well-One side is rough the other soft
customer_reviews.text: They are individual pads that are large, great for face, neck and décolletage. The "rough" side is not too rough, you do feel like it's exfoliating those cells! I like the smell, not too much. It feels very pampering to the skin. I use it once or twice a week. I've seen a difference in my skin. I consider it such a treat to have this product as part of my skin care routine.
customer_reviews.author: Ldymomo69

customer_reviews.title: One of my fav exfoliators!
customer_reviews.text: It smells like grape juice and exfoliates really well. I use the rough side first and then use the soft side to wipe away any excess skin and dirt. It does pick up a lot of stuff, you can see it. I have combo skin. It's not the cheapest product but since I only use it 1-2x a week, it's not too bad. Try it out!
customer_reviews.author: Marbel

customer_reviews.title: I really like this
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so here’s the story, it took about 3 weeks of using this 2-3 days per week to start to see results. But not that I’m starting to, it’s pretty great. My complexion is definitely getting smoother and the enlarged pores are getting smaller. I am very happy with this but a quick fix it’s not-definitely worth the wait though.
customer_reviews.author: Fay

customer_reviews.title: Holy Grail
customer_reviews.text: The wine scent smells like a grape popsicle - I love it! I store the product in my mini fridge since I live in a humid environment. After the first use my skin felt super soft and clean. I also used it on my boyfriend and his skin was glowing. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Riley

customer_reviews.title: Berry good! Haha!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for sensitive skin. I’ve noticed that a lot of exfoliating products can cause more sensitivity and irritate my skin more but this product seems to do the complete opposite. I only use it once a week and it feels like my skin is refreshed with a new surface. I love the packaging of this product too! The cotton has a slit where you can put your finger in to apply. The smell is amazing too! Will purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Annuh Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: They are also great for travel
customer_reviews.text: Chemical exfoliating can be too rough on my skin, but these textures pads allow me more control. Not only that I consistently see results with them. I am actually excited to try the other versions! They are also great for travel. Just pop a few in a ziploc bag and it is one less TSA regulation I have to worry about. This has become a staple in my skin care routine and I don't see it leaving any time soon.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Took a chance
customer_reviews.text: I took a chance on buying this product without any type of trial purchase. I LOVE IT. It smells a little fruity but nothing overwhelming. And the results are fantastic. My skin feels so smooth and soft. Crazy that one little pad and some swipes can do so much. Don't hesitate ... buy this!
customer_reviews.author: Random Reader

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good!
customer_reviews.text: Smells awesome. I don't drink, but it smells so good, I want to lick it. As for the product itself, it does get product off your skin that you might have missed during cleansing. I do notice that I don't have as much dead skin flaking off whenever I apply lotion or bb cream, so I guess it's doing its job, but I would like to try something more gentle, so I may look for a chemical exfoliant like AHA or BHA.
customer_reviews.author: Linh

customer_reviews.title: Gentle exfoliation that’s extremely efficient!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I was looking for an improvement in my exfoliation, so I tried this product. It’s amazing. Immediately after my first use, the results were apparent. It is extremely gentle and still very efficient. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: ANette 637

customer_reviews.title: Bad batch?
customer_reviews.text: I have been purchasing this item for over a year and typically love these exfoliating pads. I bought these from a different seller and they are nothing like what I've received before. They are pale and smell like chemicals. In all my past orders they have been rich in wine color and smell amazing - like a fruity candy. I tested one out and it stung a little more than normal. They were sealed and the expiration date in 2020, so I'm not sure what went wrong here. Hoping it was just a bad batch. Unfortunately, these will not be used.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far impressed.
customer_reviews.text: So far I’m impressed. Smells yummy and leaves my shin glowing And soft. . However.. I was lazy and didn’t read the direction before first use and Didn't rinse it off. Woke up with glowing skin so I’ve decided until I have a bad reaction I’m not rinsing after. It is sticky but I head to bed right after. Happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: TStelmo

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite
customer_reviews.text: Bought these after a suggestion in a magazine and have not seen a change in my skin. If you are looking for something to reduce your pore size, this may not be the product for you.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia C

customer_reviews.title: Holy grail
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the few skincare products I will always buy again as soon as I run out. I have dry skin with hormonal acne and always seem to have a handful of tiny bumps around my jawline. These pads are perfect at removing the top layer of dead skin from my face without irritating like manual exfoliation does. The pads are huge, so I cut mine in half.
customer_reviews.author: M Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Get It!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I added this to my list of Korean facial care products and it’s pretty darn fantastic! I can feel it working moments after I sweep it on my face - a slight sting. My skin has never felt softer or looked brighter. Great product. Smells like grape juice!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany L

customer_reviews.title: Loved this product and will continue to use
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product, saw results the first time I used it. When you feel like your complexion is dull, I recommend using this product, you see your complexion improve the moment you use it and still see results the next day. I also have sensitive skin and I had no bad reactions to this product as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: I love these. They smell like grape juice and make ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these. They smell like grape juice and make my skin look great. I keep the liquid on for a while after I exfoliate. My skin always looks good the next day, and its a great way to brighten your complexion if you are going out.
customer_reviews.author: jenny reviews

customer_reviews.title: Good for Sensitive Skin
customer_reviews.text: Loved this! I have super sensitive skin and always look for a product that will work with it. I’ve used this product and so no redness or break out has occurred. Besides not breaking out it leaves my face super soft.
customer_reviews.author: Yesenia Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is amazing. I never knew exfoliating could be so easy ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. I never knew exfoliating could be so easy and enjoyable. Smells just like grape juice. it's done wonders for my dry skin this winter. My moisturizer can now better seep into my skin and leave me hydrated all day long. I'm hooked!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Hearne

customer_reviews.title: Smells delicious!!
customer_reviews.text: I love almost everything about this product. They smell amazing for one. My face is clean and fresh after using this product. My only downside is that I have super sensitive skin it's ridiculous how many products I cannot use. I have to be careful when using the scratchy side of the pads, but have no issues other than that. I have repurchased this product and will continue to do so. Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Even works for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive, dry skin, and to my surprise, this stuff woked wonders! Do be sure to be extremely gentle with the gauze side of the pad; one time I was really rough and overexfoliated, but if I don't press too hard I'm good to go. If my skin is not that bad one week and I just need a gentle exfoliation, I only use the soft side and it still works great. Smells like grape candy rather than wine, but I'm ok with that since you rinse it off after.
customer_reviews.author: Circusmind

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like this product at all. The smell is waaaay overwhelming and I definitely don’t think it’s worth it for how expensive it is. I got a weird reaction on my hand a couple days after using this product ( not saying i for it from this product but it was the only new thing to my routine). Don’t recommend anyone buying and will definitely not be repurchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.title: Great overall product, leaves skin feeling clean and fresh.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for about six months now. I found that I could lengthen the use of them by cutting them in half. I still have plenty to use for my entire face and don't feel quite as bad about the money spent on them since they last longer. I usually use these as part of my nighttime routine, after cleansing my skin, but before nighttime moisturizers. I feel like my skin looks brighter and LOVE the smell - like grape juice!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Smooth like a babys butt
customer_reviews.text: Not so much "wine" scent, but more of that grape smell. Works very well; leaves my skin super soft after use. I like using it 2x a week. Make sure to use the rough side first, then turn it over and massage your face with the softer side. I like to wash it off with cold water to finish.
customer_reviews.author: Nur

customer_reviews.title: SAY GOODBYE TO MESSY SCRUB EXFOLIATORS!!
customer_reviews.text: After years of using exfoliators made from apricot seeds or something that felt like the gravel you'd use to line your fish tank, I am hooked on these Neogen pads. The Wine pads smell like Welch's grape juice (not unpleasant), there's a rougher side to help with lifting the dead skin cells, then a smooth side to wipe them away. 'Ive been using them 2 - 3 times a week and my skin feels very smooth immediately afterwards. It's been amazing not to deal with the mess of a scrub and to see and feel the difference in my skin instantly. Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: SAFFY

customer_reviews.title: Hands down the best exfoliator I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best exfoliator I've ever used. It smells great too! I have mildly sensitive combination skin and tend to break out after using new products. However, I've never had that issue with this product. My skin feels so smooth and fresh after using these!
customer_reviews.author: CHB

customer_reviews.title: The one good thing it does is that the gauze mesh does ...
customer_reviews.text: It's an ok product. The one good thing it does is that the gauze mesh does get some grime off your face but that's pretty much it. The serum leaves your face all sticky and clogged. The only good thing I like about the product is the gauze. Probably wouldn't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: NL

customer_reviews.title: Really like this skin feels smooth and smells great after :D
customer_reviews.text: This is great! It is a little expensive for me but it works wonders maybe not for use of everyday but definitely great for exfoliating and cleaning the skin if it's dirty from make up etc... I have noticed it really takes off any leftover make up or dirty bits on your skin and also helps to exfoliate very nicely. It's easy to use and smells amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Cecy ZO

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve heard so many great things about this products for years. And now that I have it I agree with every great review. I’ve only used it once and my skin is so much different! It soft! You can telll the difference in the texture I had in my skin before and after using this bio-peel. I highly recommend it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This product leaves my face feeling super smooth, bouncy, and glowy! I also noticed my acne goes away a lot quicker when I use this product! I use it twice a week and cut the pads in half so it lasts longer. I definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Kiana

customer_reviews.title: Great exfoliator
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with this product. Not only is it a great exfoliator but it also smells amazing! I use it once or twice a week, meaning that this will last me several months. This is a great addition to my 10 step korean skincare routine, I use it after double cleansing and it leaves my face super smooth and ready for toner and essence. I love the fact that international shipping was free as well, as it was shipping directly from South Korea. Another plus was that the price was way cheaper than i've seen from other websites, so all in all this was a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Hels

customer_reviews.title: Love the Grape Jelly smell
customer_reviews.text: These gentle pads helped heal my acne riddled skin after a bad breakout due to a change in the oil cleanser I was using.
customer_reviews.author: katrina turner

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: This product not only smells amazing but it works amazingly well. Cleans out my pores and also gets rid of the blackheads on my nose. My skin is so fresh and glowing after every use. I’m obsessed with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly D

customer_reviews.title: Effective and gentle
customer_reviews.text: I exfoliate with this 2x per week. Love the scent and the pads are genius. They exfoliate very well and the softer side is great for sensitive areas like neck and under chin. Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: C. Bwans

customer_reviews.title: These smell like grape kook-aid - not wine
customer_reviews.text: These smell like grape kook-aid - not wine. It's a not unpleasant and doesn't last long. They are large size with lots of liquid on them. I have aging dry skin. These help to even out my complexion and keep my skin smooth.
customer_reviews.author: FR

customer_reviews.title: No results
customer_reviews.text: Smell was very wine scented which was expected. Felt very sticky upon application and didn’t really feel like it was absorbing into my skin. Didn’t really seem to do anything for my skin, good or bad.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: I also don't like the residue it leaves behind
customer_reviews.text: Didn't do much for my skin (which is oily and has large pores). I don't really see the exfoliating dead skin coming off as others have said. I also don't like the residue it leaves behind. When I go to wipe my face with toner the next day, after washing my face again, pinkish/purple colored stuff shows up on the cotton ball.
customer_reviews.author: a.y.ko

customer_reviews.title: Redness relieved
customer_reviews.text: I love these pads and the formula. I have very sensitive skin and suffer from rosacia. My face actually hurts at times. This product is amazing. It reduces my redness and leaves my skin glowing with a polished look.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine :))

customer_reviews.title: Takes all the peelies off from Retin A and I love the huge pads
customer_reviews.text: Wonferful. Takes all the peelies off from Retin A and I love the huge pads. Still on my first jar! I lobe the wine ones. I only use every now and then. Not daily. Smooth beautiful glowing skin.
customer_reviews.author: C. Reese

customer_reviews.title: Great weekly treatment
customer_reviews.text: The scent of this is so good. It is an excellent exfoliant to use 2-3 times a week. Skin is smoother and moisturized. I would not consider this a "peel" but is more of an enzyme peel.
customer_reviews.author: SAMIEEDEE

customer_reviews.title: Great for moderate chemical/physical exfoliation!
customer_reviews.text: These exfoliating pads are great for anyone who likes a combination of chemical & light physical exfoliation. They smell like Korean grape candy and the product feels great going on! The only negative thing I can think of is it might burn your skin or cause redness if you are sensitive to chemical exfoliants. Other than that, if you are fine with moderate chemical exfoliation, this is great to use a couple times a week to get clean skin.
customer_reviews.author: Ina Beinborn

customer_reviews.title: severe breakout
customer_reviews.text: Gave me bad breakout after 2 weeks of use. Had to take a break for a month from using any cosmetic to heal the scars
customer_reviews.author: saga

customer_reviews.title: I love this! My daughter bought it for me as ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this! My daughter bought it for me as a gift, and now I have boughten it for several friends. I have rosacea and need to be careful what I use on my face. This keeps my skin smooth without causing redness. I have been using it for about a year.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Great peel
customer_reviews.text: I have to say this peel is amazing for a deep exfoliation and getting rid of any dead skin cells On the surface of your skin. I like to start with the rougher side of the pad and gently do circular motions over my face for about 2 minutes and finish with the softer side. I recommend doing this at night and sleeping in the serum so your skin can absorb all the benefits. :) my skin feels smoother and dark spots are lighter by morning.
customer_reviews.author: Harry Kongvongxay

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! Love the smell and how it works on my skin. I use it three times a week to exfoliate my skin. When I keep up with my face routine and use this three times a week I can definitely see the difference of when I don’t. I have blemishes on my cheeks due to stress/hormones and this helps getting rid of them. I will continue to order this :)
customer_reviews.author: viana cuyan

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I found it! Does NOT irritate my acne/ sensitive skin. The face pads were soaked in wine liquid & were really good material (not cheap and not easily torn) Scrubbing side it really good for dead skin and the smoothe buffing side comforts the skin. My skin feels so smoothe & clean with this.
customer_reviews.author: Merle

customer_reviews.title: Not for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Caused my skin to break out in hives for 24hrs followed by intense dry skin for about a week.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Holy Grail!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this stuff. I heard great things online about the green tea option, but at the time I bought these, all that was available was the wine option. It is incredible!I It never irritated my skin and made it super soft. 10/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Graciela Day

customer_reviews.title: These are pretty awesome. Found them from a blogger
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty awesome. Found them from a blogger. They smell like grape juice. I used it last night after washing my face and rinsing with warm water. MY FACE WAS SO SOFT!! So this morning I wake up and it's glowing. Looked in the mirror at work and my skin looks fabulous. Great. Product.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to skincare routine
customer_reviews.text: Arrived today, and tried once so far. They were great, left my skin feeling very exfoliated and smooth. Smelled a bit like Welches Grape juice though. The rough side did irritate my skin a little bit, so if you have super sensitive skin you may want to avoid. But if you slap on a sheet mask or moisturizer after, you should be good.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Not as effective as in the past
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought this 3-4 times over the past 2 years & really love it. This latest purchase though, The formulation was off? Color was too light & the smell was different. It also didn’t work as effectively. I’m super disappointed & guess it’s time to look for something else :(
customer_reviews.author: faye barentine

customer_reviews.title: I love it. I will be buying again
customer_reviews.text: I'm writing this review after using about half of it. I got to say, I love it. I will be buying again. It's an awesome exfoliator. It take off more gunk off my face even after double cleansing!!! My skin definitely feels more plump after using it. Btw I also have troubled sensitive skin and this didn't cause any problems for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely!!!
customer_reviews.text: They are so so amazing. They smell wonderful (if you are a fan of grape soda or candy, you will love this!) I use it twice a week right before shower and my skin feels so clean and smooth after. Highly recommend it!!! Sephora has them for double the price!
customer_reviews.author: joyous

customer_reviews.title: Radiant skin!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. I have been using it for a few years, twice a week, and am still shocked at how radiant my skin is the day after using it.
customer_reviews.author: LH

product_meta.title: DERMALOGY by NEOGENLAB Bio-Peel Gauze Peeling Pads
